ProvideJobDescriptionsPage.title: Provide Job Descriptions
ProvideJobDescriptionsPage.description: Paste up to three job descriptions below. We'll use these to compare against your resume and find the best matches.

Hero.tagline: Increase your interview chances with a perfectly tailored resume.

UploadResume.title: Upload Your Resume
UploadResume.description: Drag and drop your resume file below or click to browse. Supported formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX (Upto 2 MB).

FileUpload.uploadSuccessNoId: Upload succeeded but no resume ID received.
FileUpload.unknownError: An unknown error occurred during upload.
FileUpload.fileSelected: File selected. Remove to upload another.
FileUpload.dropzoneLabel: File upload dropzone. Drag & drop or click to browse.
FileUpload.dragDropClick: Drag & drop or click (PDF, DOCX up to {maxSize})
